member.name: T:BifurcationFrontend.FrontendService
member.summary: the class FrontendService represents the sbw service that implements the updateStatus service method for the frontend. the sbw bifurcation module will call the updataStatus method from time to time to transmit preliminay results.

member.name: F:BifurcationFrontend.FrontendService.m_oForm
member.summary: the windows form representing the frontend for the bifurcation module

member.summary: main method for this application ... this will set up the SBW module representing the frontend

member.summary: the analysis method that will be called by JDesigner

member.name: M:BifurcationFrontend.FrontendService.oFrontendModule_ModuleShutdown(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: the module shutdown handler. This will be called if the broker shuts down this module

member.name: M:BifurcationFrontend.FrontendService.updateStatus(System.Collections.ArrayList)
member.summary: the updateStatus method will be called by the bifurcation module to send preliminary data to the frontend. this data will then be displayed.
